Canadian_Record_of_Employment_Data_Data.description: ROE Serial Number. Must be 9 characters. This is present when the ROE is Issued.
ROE Date Issued. Must be 8 characters in the format "DDMMYYYY". This is present when the ROE is issued.
Employer's Payroll Reference Number. Must be 15 characters or less.
Social Insurance Number of the Employee for whom ROE will be issued.
First Day Worked. Must be 8 characters in the format "DDMMYYYY".
Last day for which paid. Must be 8 characters in the format "DDMMYYYY".
Final pay period ending date. Must be 8 characters in the format "DDMMYYYY".

Unique_IdentifierObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Unique_IdentifierObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Unique_IdentifierObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Canadian_Record_of_Employment_Data_Data.description: The Status of the ROE to be updated.

description: This is the ROE Data Element

validation.validation: For a Issued ROE, both Serial Number and Date Issued fields are required.
